character.name: Marina

appearance.hair: black curly hair, usually wrapped in a colorful headwrap (turbante) or pulled back
appearance.build: strong, sturdy build from years of physical work
appearance.distinguishing_features: weathered hands, strong arms, bright warm smile with laugh lines, medium height

character.occupation: Fisherwoman and community leader in Tumaco, Narino, Colombia. Goes out on her fishing boat at dawn, sells catch at the local fish market, leads community meetings in the afternoons.
character.living_situation: Wooden stilted house near the waterfront in Tumaco with husband Roberto (48, also a fisherman) and teenage daughter Yurany (16, high school student)
character.transportation: Walks in town. Uses a small wooden motorboat (lancha) for fishing. Roberto has a motorcycle for longer trips.

style.fishing: Rubber boots (botas pantaneras), waterproof pants, old t-shirt or tank top, wide-brimmed hat, colorful headwrap underneath
style.market_town: Colorful printed dress or blouse with skirt, sandals, headwrap, small gold hoop earrings
style.community_meeting: Clean blouse, long skirt, headwrap, her good sandals
style.sleep: Light cotton nightgown, simple solid color

background.family: Married to Roberto (48, fisherman), daughter Yurany (16, high school student), extended family in Tumaco and nearby villages
background.faith: Catholic, devotion to Virgen del Carmen (patron saint of fishermen), small religious image in bedroom
background.culture: Afro-Colombian Pacific coast traditions, fishing heritage, coconut-based cuisine, marimba music, oral storytelling, strong community bonds

lora_settings.notes: May need Afro-Colombian female character LoRA. Search CivitAI for appropriate options. Adjust strength based on consistency results. Headwrap/turbante is a key consistency element.

reference_images.strategy: Use existing anime character LoRA from CivitAI for POC
reference_images.alternative_1: Generate 3-5 consistent anime images and use with IP-Adapter
reference_images.alternative_2: Train custom anime LoRA with 15-20 reference images

flexible_features: hair style (headwrap for most, loose for sleep/morning)
avoid_variations: Different skin tones (must remain dark brown)

notes.educational_context: This character represents an Afro-Colombian fisherwoman and community leader from the Pacific coast. Shows fishing traditions, market life, community leadership, and family dynamics in a coastal Colombian town.
notes.cultural_context: Tumaco Pacific coast lifestyle, Afro-Colombian cultural traditions, fishing heritage, wooden stilted houses, coconut-based cuisine (coconut rice, fried fish, patacones), Virgen del Carmen devotion, marimba music, community solidarity
notes.pedagogical_goal: Help learners see diverse representation while learning vocabulary through a relatable fisherwoman's daily activities including fishing, market selling, community leadership, family cooking, and Pacific coast cultural practices
